markdownRemark.html: <i></i>   <i></i>   <i></i> 1<p>Cheating is a shameful act and violation of someone’s trust. Trust is the foundation of a relationship. Gaining trust is most difficult thing in the world however you can lose it in a flash. Cheating is debatable amongst people, sometimes people don’t even realize what they are doing may count as cheating. It maybe because sometimes couple rarely discuss what their expectations are from a relationship. But the ground rule is the same being, whatever you do if it makes your partner feel betrayed or rejected counts as cheating, and when this happens it can unleash devastating consequences leaving both partners emotionally unavailable and physically abused.</p> <p>Unfortunately we have become a part of society where sometimes number count of partners matter and being committed to one healthy relationship is looked down upon. Also sometimes we don’t see it but the space we are giving to out partners is not enough at it might scare them off giving them a reason to cheat. But none of us is perfect. The truth will eventually come out either by your mistakes or through the way karma works.</p> <p>Following are some points that will convince you that there is every chance of truth finding its way out to the right person through texts and screenshots and you will end up losing the person, whom you know deep inside, you don’t want to.</p> <h2>13. Carelessness while texting</h2> <img src="https://cdnone.netlify.com/db/2017/10/word-image-1339.jpeg"/>Tapoos.com <p>Texting is the easiest and most commom way to communicate with anyone. It’s sweet when you can share everything through text with your partner even in the busiest of your times but what if they find out something they are not supposed to know through the very text messages that connect you just because you were not being careful enough to check the recipient name. Yes, there is every chance you end up texting your partner things that you are keeping from them that mostly involves your being engaged with someone else. You might be expecting someone else to receive it while in this preoccupancy of mind your invitation to the destruction of a relationship is delivered.</p> <h2>12. Block your Ex or else</h2> <img src="https://cdnone.netlify.com/db/2017/10/word-image-1340.jpeg"/>Tapoos.com <p>Make sure you block your ex after cheating on them. Sometimes when you don’t block your ex the remorse will get to you and even if you are committed to them this time you will be kept reminding of how you cheated them in the worst ways you could possibly imagine. For instance your ex will text you the cheap and embarrassing poems about cheating. If you are emotionally strong enough to not get back with trust me you would still want to block them because as long as they can contact you, you can never be in a happy relationship afterwards. And if that’s not convincing enough, everyone in your circle, including your new partner will picture you as the cheater one. So be ready for the consequences if you have cheated someone and they can still contact you.</p> <h2>11. Leaving your phone out of sight is big trouble ahead</h2> <img src="https://cdnone.netlify.com/db/2017/10/word-image-1341.jpeg"/>Tapoos.com <p>There have been times when a person realizes they have left their phone at the partner’s home when there is 100% chance of getting texts from the other one. The moment they realize what they have done their stress story begins. The tension and the fear of may or may not getting caught will take away their breaths unless they get their cell back. But even when they get it back they must make sure they have the guts to tackle the situation when they find a conversation among both their partners. So just make sure before cheating anyone if you are smart enough to get away with it without anyone knowing it.</p> <h2>10. Don’t cheat if you have a weakness</h2> <img src="https://cdnone.netlify.com/db/2017/10/word-image-1342.jpeg"/>Tapoos.com <p>You might have a dear thing that you would never want to let go of, well make sure to keep it in a safe place before you cheat on your girlfriend with some random girl in a party. Because who knows it is the last day of it being with you and the next day a deadliest of text message arrives giving you chance to say one last goodbye to them. That single text can be really scary. So if you don’t want the next text about your Xbox getting broken or your Limited edition watch getting a bump just stay loyal.</p> <h2>9. Always ask everything before you reply</h2> <img src="https://cdnone.netlify.com/db/2017/10/word-image-1343.jpeg"/>Tapoos.com <p>Always clear things off before you confess anything over text messages because sometimes the guilt can limit your thinking and when it combines with getting back at someone, you end up telling them what you weren’t supposed to. Make sure what your partner is talking about while confessing they have cheated off of you before you consider it a threat to relation and end up confessing about your relationship with their brother while it turns out that they were just talking about the math test. And then no matter how much you try to retrieve it she shot once fired won’t return.</p> <h2>8. When you are lying</h2> <img src="https://cdnone.netlify.com/db/2017/10/word-image-1344.jpeg"/>Tapoos.com <p>When your partner asks you and you lie to them about your presence, well take a good look around you before thinking you can get away by lying to them about your location. There is a probability that they are standing right behind you watching you making out with someone else without feeling guilty of the lies you just told them. There can be drastic consequences including the little heart attack or blackout when you see them standing right behind you when you were supposed to be in bed with a thermometer in your mouth.</p>     <h2>7. Make sure who are you breaking up with</h2> <img src="https://cdnone.netlify.com/db/2017/10/word-image-1345.jpeg"/>Tapoos.com <p>Ever wondered the feeling of being on the verge of a destination and making a little mistake to mess up everything. Well, so can happen when you have cheated on someone and just when you think are going to get away with it by breaking up with them over a text message, that little mistake is just made when you realize you just broke up with one who you were going to keep.</p> <h2>6. Never go for your partner’s BFF</h2> <img src="https://cdnone.netlify.com/db/2017/10/word-image-1346.jpeg"/>Tapoos.com <p>Never try to hit on your partner’s BFF. Not specially through text message because there is no secret that exists among two girls. And when you do make sure your partner is not there watching you cheating her or it is also possible that it is your girlfriend replying you from her friend’s phone. So either be careful or behave.</p> <h2>5. Leave no conversation undeleted</h2> <img src="https://cdnone.netlify.com/db/2017/10/word-image-1347.jpeg"/>Tapoos.com <p>Having contact with a few seducing ladies who are ready to cheat their husband at their back? Well if this is so never keep a conversation with her on your phone because your partner can smell the signs of cheating and will eventually get a hold of your phone ending up reading the texts that fine lady has sent to convince you to pull over at her home after work. And even if you are innocent enough to reject this proposal, who would believe you to have turned down such a proposal when they find the next thing in conversation is a photo of her.</p> <h2>4. The good news confusion</h2> <img src="https://cdnone.netlify.com/db/2017/10/word-image-1348.jpeg"/>Tapoos.com <p>How sweet would it be when one day your wife texts you about being pregnant. But what if you find out she wrote your brother name by mistake as the father’s name, or did she actually made a mistake? Well God works in mysterious ways, the truth will, by any means find it’s way out but you should ask yourself if you are ready to bear the consequences.</p> <h2>3. Making plans with someone?</h2> <img src="https://cdnone.netlify.com/db/2017/10/word-image-1349.jpeg"/>Tapoos.com <p>Thinking about your big night tonight with your coworker, with same name as your daughter? You don’t have to worry about if you haven’t said anything to piss your little girl off. But if you are going to be a bad dad cheating her mom, be ready to buy her some really expensive new stuff if your plans with your coworker are sent to your daughter on the night you were supposed to be in an official meeting.</p> <h2>2. New cars can cover up your cheating lies</h2> <img src="https://cdnone.netlify.com/db/2017/10/word-image-1350.jpeg"/>Tapoos.com <p>When you are cheating your wife with someone and your kids think their dad is too rich, then a the cost of a car can cover for your cheating. But if you haven’t got enough reserves left after throwing the money at the girl, be ready when your beloved kids become the reason for breaking your “home sweet home”.</p> <h3>1. If you are sloppy in love, you are sloppy everywhere</h3> <img src="https://cdnone.netlify.com/db/2017/10/word-image-1351.jpeg"/>Tapoos.com     <p>When you have sent one of your kids, a text with your sweet cheating story and then concealed it with a smart statement on the basis of technicality or by blaming auto-correction, don’t get over excited about it to tell the tale to you buddy. Because when you can cheat you partner, your conscience can cheat you and you find out you actually confessed on your cheating story and this time with no loopholes for an exit.</p>    <i></i>
